title: Astounding Science Fiction v40n01
creator: Street and Smith Publications
description: Astounding Science Fiction , Volume 40 Number 1, September of 1947. Published by Street & Smith Publications, Inc., New York, NY. 164 pages. Cover art by Alejandro de Cañedo. Edited by John W. Campbell, Jr. Featuring essays by John W. Campbell, Jr. as The Editor, Willy Ley, David A. Anderton and an uncredited author. Includes the following works of fiction: Meddler's Moon, a novelette by George O. Smith. Conquest..., a shortstory by O. W. Hopkinson, Jr. Hobbyist, a novelette by Eric Frank Russell. The Thing on Outer Shoal, a shortstory by P. Schuyler Miller. I'll Build Your Dream Castle (variant of Dream Castle), a shortstory by Jack Vance. The End Is Not Yet (Part 2 of 3), a  serial novel by L. Ron Hubbard.
